hero.title: Strategic growth across Latin America.
hero.subtitle: Built with experience. Executed with precision.
hero.description: Alter Capital supports technology companies and global organizations expanding into Latin America through strategic execution, deep local insight, and high-level access.
hero.location: Based in São Paulo. Active across Latin America.

about.label: OUR PHILOSOPHY
about.title: Experience first. Growth follows.
about.p1: Alter Capital is a strategic advisory and investment firm focused on enabling efficient growth across Latin America.
about.p2: We work alongside founders, executives, and global decision-makers to help companies enter new markets, scale operations, and structure cross-border activities with clarity and confidence.
about.p3: Our approach combines senior-level experience, deep regional knowledge, and an extensive high-level network, allowing our clients to grow without unnecessary complexity, cost, or exposure.
about.quote: Growth is not about moving fast, it is about moving right.

tradeFinance.title: Trade Finance, Commodities & Energy
tradeFinance.description: Alter Capital provides specialized advisory on trade finance structures, commodity trading, and energy sector operations across Latin America.

expansion.title: Business Expansion & Market Development
expansion.description: We support technology companies, startups, and international organizations expanding into Latin America, particularly Brazil, through hands-on strategic execution.
items: Market validation without heavy upfront investment

investments.title: Strategic Investments
investments.description: Alter Capital invests proprietary capital alongside founders and early-stage companies, primarily at seed, angel, and Series A/B stages.

flexible.title: Flexible by design
flexible.p1: Our model is flexible by design. Engagements may be project-based or ongoing, structured or highly adaptive, depending entirely on client needs.
flexible.p2: We prioritize proximity, direct communication, and alignment, operating as trusted partners rather than external advisors.

custom.title: Custom solutions
custom.p1: Every solution is custom-built. There are no templates, only strategy, execution, and results.
custom.p2: We believe expansion should be intentional, structured, and adaptable. Our team combines years of experience across multiple markets with an extensive, high-level network spanning Latin America and international markets.

experience.title: Experience powered by access
experience.p1: Alter Capital is built on years of experience across multiple markets and industries. Our strength lies in an extensive, high-level network enabling efficient access to decision-makers, partners, and strategic opportunities.
experience.p2: We activate this network selectively, always aligned with our clients' objectives and operational realities.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.description: We're interested in learning about your growth ambitions and how we can help.
